summary:
The Ambassador from the Shivering Isles is staying at the Drunken Huntsman.

This Mod adds a merchant NPC to the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.
He sells a number of high quality import items from the Isles.
Some of them have their use, some of them are just insanely unnecessary.
descriptionHtml:
[b]DISCLAIMER:
This is an old, tiny mod I chose to upload at the request of another user. Maybe someone will still see it and have some fun with it.[/b]


The Ambassador from the Shivering Isles is staying at the Drunken Huntsman.

This Mod adds a merchant NPC to the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.
He sells a number of high quality import items from the Isles.
Some of them have their use, some of them are just insanely unnecessary.
Nothing overpowered/gamebreaking I hope, and if I'm wrong, then well, just a tiny bit.

WHILE THIS MOD IS FINISHED IN THEORY, I MAY KEEP ADDING THINGS.
MAIL SUGGESTIONS/REQUESTS THAT FIT THIS THEMATIC TO madislemerchant@gmail.com

Sheogorath's Bow makes enemies drop special cheese.
Sugarbane fills Tasteless Sugargems with taste, making them a more powerful snack.
Use cheese and sugar gems at the cooking pot to create some powerful food items.

For a detailed list of items and spells, follow this link:
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://freetexthost.com/qmczcdv60j]http://freetexthost.com/qmczcdv60j[/url]
For a list of update changes, follow this link:
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://freetexthost.com/qt6nljte4k]http://freetexthost.com/qt6nljte4k[/url]

List of Items:
-Azura's Sugarstar
-Bitter Azura's Sugarstar
-Blade of the Priest
-Blissful Grape Juice
-Cheese Arrow
-Deodoraxe
-Fork of Horripilation
-Grapes of Wrath
-Ironic Dagger
-Knife of Consternation
-Mad Cheese Fondue
-Necklace of the Crimson Bull
-Necklace of Patience
-Patient Arrow
-Ring of Disrobing
-Staff of Disabling
-Staff of Disintegration
-Scimitar of the Wealthy Merchant
-Scimitar of the Sultan
-Scimitar of Mammon
-Sheogorath's Everbound Bow
-Sheogorath's Special Cheese
-Sheogorath's Special Reserve
-Sheogorath's Clothes
-Sheogorath's Boots
-Soul Tomato
-Sugarbane Blade
-Tasteless/Normal/Grand Sugar Gem
-The Emperor's Old Clothes
-Unlikely Arrow
-Vinegar of Dementia

List of spells:
-Create Delicious Sweetrolls
-Conjure Dremora Thrall
-Conjure Ghostly Crab
-Conjure Rat Plague
-Detect People Who Love You
-Magic Insult
-Force Timetravel On Enemy
-Ultimate Healing


By the way, attacking an official ambassador from the realm of madness might be a bad idea.


KNOWN BUGS/CONFLICTING MODS:
Sheogorath's Everbound Bow has not Inventory Image, rest works just fine.
If you find any, or have suggestions, please write to me at madislemerchant@gmail.com
author: Ryowyn
